name: Project: Country
description:
Take the challenge of becoming the president of a failing country. Will you be able to live righteously or will you fall to the corrupt side?

In this game you take the role of a recently elected president, but your country is failing. Each month you will be given 3 presidential actions, that you may approve or disapprove, but remember: this will have consequences. Keep up with the media and what it says about you and your country! You can be loved by everyone or hated and having people remove you from power! 

Made during the Game Jam +

Team:

  • Camila Sfeir Ribeiro
  • Danilo Neumann Marques
  • Kaz Born
  • Nathan Floriano Diogo
  • Pedro Valim
